name: The 2048 Game
description: The 2048 game is the first game I made with my new GameEngine, it's written in Golang(for anyone interested: https://korok.io). I have ported the game to MAC and Android, but both Mac Store and Google Play rejected my game, maybe there are too much  '2048' games there. What I want is not to earn money, but to show something made with my Engine. Unfortunately, they don't provide the place. Before I found itch.io, I have beed frustrated for weeks.  But here I find my new life, itch.io, Thanks!
